subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Gary Contessa, who in 1981 walked the upset winner Willow Hour to the summer’s marquee event at the Saratoga Race Course, has entered Speightscity, a 30-1 dark horse, this year.
snippet: Gary Contessa, who in 1981 walked the upset winner Willow Hour to the summer’s marquee event at the Saratoga Race Course, has entered Speightscity, a 30-1 dark horse, this year.
